Workflow

How It Works

01

Wrap

Employer wraps USDC into confidential cUSDC

02

Score

Trust scores encrypted and stored on-chain via FHE

03

Pay

Batch payroll routes payments by encrypted trust tiers

04

Claim

Employees decrypt and claim their confidential salary
